attributes.action: Stop Donald Trump official visit to UK until his ban order on refugees is lifted
attributes.additional_details:
Donald Trump, now US president issued an executive order of blanket banning of refugees entries to US.
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-38781302
attributes.background: Donald J Trump's executive order to ban US entry of refugees fleeing violence and seeking safety of their lives represents everything the western world did not stand for in humanity . Trump should not receive UK hospitality visit when he denied the same to thousands fleeing persecution and violence
